review_data.title: Excellent food
review_data.content: Excellent crispy duck and hot pot. The owners and staff are warm, friendly and welcoming. Service is good. I would recommend and will definitely be returning.

review_data.title: Great food at Lucky Noodle
review_data.content: My favorite Asian /Chinese place in Zurich ! Great quality and good price ! All ingredients well selected and Makes you really feel the taste of a food prepared with care and love !

review_data.title: Very good for a quick lunch
review_data.content: I ate here twice already and found it very good (so did my colleagues). Lunches are served fairly quick, are very tasty and staff is very nice and helpful. It’s good to book for lunch as it becomes quite full.

review_data.title: Best soup I ever had
